Name:
=====
 uart_hci_bridge


Description:
============
 UART driver for uart hci bridge




Purpose:
========
This example demonstrates UART HCI (Host Controller
 Interface) bridge functionality for Bluetooth communication. The application
 showcases UART driver implementation, HCI protocol handling, and
 radio communication management.

Section: Key Features
=====================

 1. UART HCI Bridge: Implements UART HCI bridge functionality
    for Bluetooth communication management

 2. HCI Protocol Handling: Provides HCI protocol
    support for command, ACL, SCO, and ISO data types

 3. Radio Communication: Implements radio communication management
    for Bluetooth data transfer and control

 4. UART Driver: Provides UART driver implementation
    with interrupt handling and data buffering

 5. Power Management: Implements power management features for
    efficient Bluetooth communication

Section: Functionality
======================

 The application performs the following operations:
 - Initializes UART HCI bridge with driver support
 - Implements HCI protocol handling for multiple data types
 - Provides radio communication management capabilities
 - Manages UART interrupt handling and data buffering
 - Supports power management for efficient operation
 - Implements UART HCI bridge functionality

Section: Usage
==============

 1. Compile and download the application to target device
 2. Configure UART pins for HCI communication
 3. Monitor UART output for HCI operations and status
 4. Test HCI protocol handling and radio communication
 5. Verify Bluetooth communication capabilities

Section: Configuration
======================

 - UART Pins: TX/RX pin configuration for HCI communication
 - HCI Protocol: Command, ACL, SCO, and ISO data type support
 - Radio Management: Bluetooth radio communication setup
 - Power Management: Efficient power management configuration
